uvi.product_version: versions from v5.7 to before v5.15.5
uvi.description:
net/mlx5e: CT, Fix multiple allocations and memleak of mod acts

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.5 by commit 486e8de6e233ff2999493533c6259d1cb538653b, it was introduced in version v5.7 by commit 1ef3018f5af3da6376fae546e4dfc3f05f063815. For more details please see the references link.
